author: cnbc.com
title: John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc. 3rd Quarter Fiscal 2018 Operating Results Conference Call
text:
Elgin, IL, John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc. (NASDAQ: JBSS), a major processor and distributor of snack and recipe nut products, will hold its quarterly conference call to discuss its third quarter fiscal 2018 operating results on Friday, May 4, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time (9:00 a.m. Central Time). Third quarter fiscal 2018 results are expected to be released after the market closes on Thursday, May 3, 2018.
The dial-in numbers for this call are 1-844-536-5471 from the U.S. or 1-614-999-9317 internationally and refer to the conference ID number 3644109.
This call is being webcast by NASDAQ OMX and can be accessed at John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc.’s Web site at www.jbssinc.com .
The webcast is also being distributed through the Thomson StreetEvents Network to both institutional and individual investors. Institutional investors can access the call via Thomson’s password-protected event management site, StreetEvents ( www.streetevents.com ).
John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc. is a processor, packager, marketer and distributor of nut and dried fruit based products that are sold under a variety of private brands and under the Company’s Fisher®, Orchard Valley Harvest®, Squirrel Brand® , Southern Style Nuts® and Sunshine Country® brand names.
Michael J. Valentine Chief Financial Officer 847-214-4509 Frank S. Pellegrino Sr. Vice President, Finance & Corporate Controller 847-214-4138
Source:John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc.
